message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the analysis and recognition of human actions in videos, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.MM). The use of GLAC features and CRC classifier also suggests a focus on pattern recognition and classification, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.LG and cs.IR. Additionally, the paper involves the processing of motion and static images, which could be relevant to the sub-category of cs.HC (human-computer interaction).
